data.text: Due wo Ariel,
Nanso metua Ariel ano;
Mede dɔm betwa wo ho ahyia;
Wɔasie wo no, wobɛkasa afi asase mu;
Nanso wʼatamfo bebrebe no bɛyɛ sɛ mfutuma muhumuhu,
Asafo Awurade bɛba.
Afei amanaman bebrebe a wotu Ariel so sa nyinaa,
Sɛnea obi a ɔkɔm de no so dae sɛ ɔredidi,
Mo ho nnwiriw mo na ɛnyɛ mo nwonwa,
Awurade de nnahɔɔ ato mo so:

Mo de, saa anisoadehu yi nyinaa nka hwee mma mo, ɛte sɛ nsɛm a wɔasɔw ano wɔ nhoma mmobɔwee mu. Sɛ mode nhoma mmobɔwee no ma obi a, otumi kenkan, na moka kyerɛ no se, “Mesrɛ wo kenkan eyi” a, obebua se, “Merentumi, efisɛ wɔasɔw ano.”
Sɛ nso, mode nhoma mmobɔwee no ma nea onnim akenkan, na moka kyerɛ no se, “Mesrɛ wo kenkan eyi” a, obebua se, “Minnim akenkan.”
Awurade ka se,
Enti mɛma nnipa yi ho adwiriw wɔn bio
Wonnue, wɔn a wɔyɛ biribiara sɛ
Musisi nneɛma ti ase,
Ɛrenkyɛ koraa, wɔrennan Lebanon nyɛ no asasebere
Saa da no, ɔsotifo bɛte nsɛm a ɛwɔ nhoma mmobɔwee no mu
Ahobrɛasefo bedi ahurusi wɔ Awurade mu bio;
Atutuwpɛfo bɛyera,
wɔn a wɔka asɛm baako ma obi di fɔ,
Enti sɛɛ na Awurade a ogyee Abraham nkwa no
Sɛ wohu wɔn mma wɔ wɔn mu,
Wɔn a wɔfom kwan wɔ honhom mu benya ntease;
